Debian_9.0 openup2u-client-2.5.4+oc-2761

Add (at least temporarily) a download repository. This requires registering trusted key. (More information). Run the following shell commands to trust the repository:

wget -nv https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/Debian_9.0/Release.key -O - | sudo apt-key add -

Run the following shell commands to add the repository and install from there.

echo 'deb https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/Debian_9.0/ /' | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/owncloud.list
sudo apt update
sudo apt install openup2u-client

Download packages manually (without adding a repo)

Add (at least temporarily) a download repository. This requires registering trusted key. (More information). Run the following shell commands to trust the repository:

echo 'deb https://cdn.test.up2university.eu/open/cernbox-clients/linux/Debian_8.0/ /' | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/owncloud.list
